price: Ohunkóhun tí ó bá kàn yín nínú àdánwò, ohun tí ẹ fi ọwọ́ ara yín fà ni.¹ Ó sì ń ṣàmójúkúrò níbi ọ̀pọ̀lọ́pọ̀.
arabic: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُم مِّن مُّصِيبَةٖ فَبِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَيَعۡفُواْ عَن كَثِيرٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā aṣābakum min muṣībatin fabimā kasabat aydīkum wayaʿfū ʿan kathīrin
